column1: The pet store catalog is organized hierarchically as follows: categories
You list the pets in a category by clicking on the category name in the left column of the main page
column2: or by clicking on the picture representing the category.

the pet store will display a list of products within a category. Selecting a product displays a list of items and their prices. Selecting a product item displays a text and visual description of the item and the number of that item in stock.
